description:
Your go-to for casual days at home or epic cross-country journeys, the Brion Short II is always up for anything. Made with ReZion™, the Earth-friendly evolution of their bestselling performance fabric, you can adventure confidently knowing there are over two decades of tried and trusted durability backing you up.

This men's short may have an easygoing look, but don't be fooled. On top of the strength that comes standard in all of their ReZion™ styles, they reinforced the back pockets with a double needle topstitch. Because you can never have too much security in your shorts, right?
name: Prana Brion Shorts II, 9" Inseam - Mens
